value.name: Cop under investigation for shooting of Romir Talley hired, then fired from Penn Hills police
value.description: In December 2019, then-Wilkinsburg Police Officer Robert Gowans shot and killed Romir Talley, a 24-year-old Black man. After initially failing to release Gowans' name,

value.name: After community outrage, Penn Hills fires controversial police officer
value.description: FAWN WALKER MONTGOMERY, with Take Action Mon Valley and Justice For Romir Talley, was outraged when she learned Officer Robert Gowans, who shot and killed the 24-year-old Talley as a Wilkinsburg Police Officer in 2019 and is currently under investigation,

value.name: Police Locate Truck Connected To Killings In Westmoreland County
value.description: KDKA's Pam Surano has more from Manor Borough, where police found a truck connection to a double homicide in Westmoreland County.

value.name: Penn Hills fires officer Robert Gowans from police department
value.description: PENN HILLS, Pa. — Penn Hills has fired police officer Robert Gowans, the officer who was involved in the shooting death of Romir Talley in Wilkinsburg in 2019. The deputy mayor of Penn Hills ...

value.name: Penn Hills manager says he 'regrets' hiring former Wilkinsburg officer under investigation in shooting death
value.description: After Penn Hills reversed course on the hiring of former Wilkinsburg officer Robert Gowans to its police department, Penn Hills Manager Scott Andrejchak said he regrets approving the hiring in the first place.

value.name: Penn Hills reverses decision on hiring former Wilkinsburg police officer under investigation in shooting death

value.name: Former Wilkinsburg Police Officer Under Investigation For Shooting Romir Talley Hired By Penn Hills Police Department
value.description: PENN HILLS, Pa. (KDKA) — The former Wilkinsburg police officer who is under investigation for shooting and killing Romir Talley was recently hired as part of the Penn Hills Police Department.

value.name: Officer Under Investigation For Shooting Romir Talley Hired By Penn Hills Police
value.description: Romir Talley was killed when police responded to a call about a Black man who had pulled a gun on the caller. Police say Talley ran from the officers and fired a shot at them. Officer Gowans returned fire, shooting Talley seven times. Tally's family has filed an excessive force lawsuit, claiming witness accounts differ from those of the police.
